did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Board for Waterworks and Wastewater Works Operators and Onsite Sewage System Professionals,
did.origination: Virginia. Board for Waterworks and Wastewater Works Operators and Onsite Sewage System Professionals

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Board for Waterworks and Wastewater Works Operators was established in 1971 to regulate individuals who operate water and wastewater treatment facilities. The Board issues licenses to operate waterworks or wastewater works. It also protects public health, welfare and property, conserves and protects water resources of the Commonwealth and requires examination of operators and certification of their competence to supervise and operate waterworks and wastewater works. In 2009, oversight for Onsite Sewage System Professionals was added to the responsibilities of the board and the name of the board was changed. The Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation provides administrative support to the board.

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation record group (RG 17)

accessrestrict.p: Meeting attachments must be reviewed for personal information and redacted prior to serving.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Board for Waterworks and Wastewater Works Operators, Minutes, 1991-1995. Accession 36316. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 36316 was transferred by Waters, Dawn, Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation, 3600 West Broad Street, Richmond, VA 23230, 02/08/1999

scopecontent.p: Includes official board minutes, agendas and related attachments documenting the activities of the Virginia Board for Waterworks and Wastewater Works Operators and Onsite Sewage System Professionals. May include informal fact finding conference records and conflict of interest statements.
